entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse ......Trump, we still have food lines all over the country....115,000 coronavirus deaths...mass incarcerations, protests and rioting....police brutality.....it took a matter of weeks for the "greatest economy in the history of the world" to unravel.
